title: Flow Measure Value
description: Profile — Individual measure value block. Represents a single data point with optional attribute breakdown.

$comment.const: Measure value — a single data point with optional attribute breakdown

$namespace.description: Profile namespace URI for this building block

quality.description: OPC quality code for the value (e.g. 192 = Good)

formattedValue.description: The measure value formatted according to the measure's display format

duration.description: Duration associated with this value (in seconds)

attribute.description: Event attribute name (present only when event attributes exist)

attributeValue.description: Event attribute value (present only when event attributes exist)
